result.title: Need Help About a Structure Related Problem in C
result.content:
I've gone this far , i don't no what to do when i heard I should have taken 18 inputs , please guyz if you can fix me the code .

include<stdio.h>

include <string.h>

struct student { char name[20]; char group[20]; int marks[20][20]; int gpa[20];

};

struct marks2 { int sub1; int sub2; int sub3; int s;

};

int main() { int i,total=0 , sub1gpa[20],sub2gpa[20],sub3gpa[20],cgpa=0; struct student a[10]; struct marks2 s[10];

for(i=0; i<=1; i++)
{
    printf("Enter Name :");
    gets(a[i].name);
    fflush(stdin);

    printf("Enter Group :");
    gets(a[i].group);
    fflush(stdin);


    printf("\nEnter Marks in Three Subjects = ");
    scanf("%d%d%d",& s[i].sub1,&s[i].sub2,&s[i].sub3);
    fflush(stdin);
    total=s[i].sub1+s[i].sub2+s[i].sub3;
    printf("\nTotal marks of s[%d] Student= %d",i,total);
    printf("\n");





        if(s[i].sub1 >= 90 && s[i].sub1 <=100)
        {
                sub1gpa[i]=5;
                printf("%d",sub1gpa[i]);
        }
        else if ( s[i].sub1 >= 80 && s[i].sub1 <=89)
        {
                    sub1gpa[i]=4;
                printf("%d",sub1gpa[i]);
        }
        else if ( s[i].sub1 >= 70 && s[i].sub1<=79)
        {
                    sub1gpa[i]=3;
                printf("%d",sub1gpa[i]);
        }

        else if ( s[i].sub1 >= 60 && s[i].sub1<=69)
        {
                sub1gpa[i]=2;
                printf("%d",sub1gpa[i]);
        }

        else if ( s[i].sub1 >= 50 && s[i].sub1 <=59)
        {
                sub1gpa[i]=1;
                printf("%d",sub1gpa[i]);
        }

        else if ( s[i].sub1 >= 0 && s[i].sub1 <=49)
        {
                sub1gpa[i]=0;
                printf("%d",sub1gpa[i]);
        }



        if(s[i].sub2 >= 90 && s[i].sub2 <=100)
        {
                sub2gpa[i]=5;
                printf("%d",sub2gpa[i]);
        }
        else if ( s[i].sub2 >= 80 && s[i].sub2 <=89)
        {
                    sub2gpa[i]=4;
                printf("%d",sub2gpa[i]);
        }
        else if ( s[i].sub2 >= 70 && s[i].sub2<=79)
        {
                    sub2gpa[i]=3;
                printf("%d",sub2gpa[i]);
        }

        else if ( s[i].sub2 >= 60 && s[i].sub2<=69)
        {
                sub2gpa[i]=2;
                printf("%d",sub2gpa[i]);
        }

        else if ( s[i].sub2 >= 50 && s[i].sub2 <=59)
        {
                sub2gpa[i]=1;
                printf("%d",sub2gpa[i]);
        }

        else if ( s[i].sub2 >= 0 && s[i].sub2 <=49)
        {
                sub2gpa[i]=0;
                printf("%d",sub2gpa[i]);
        }



        if(s[i].sub3 >= 90 && s[i].sub3 <=100)
        {
                sub3gpa[i]=5;
                printf("%d",sub3gpa[i]);
        }
        else if ( s[i].sub3 >= 80 && s[i].sub3 <=89)
        {
                    sub3gpa[i]=4;
                printf("%d",sub3gpa[i]);
        }
        else if ( s[i].sub3 >= 70 && s[i].sub3<=79)
        {
                    sub3gpa[i]=3;
                printf("%d",sub3gpa[i]);
        }

        else if ( s[i].sub3 >= 60 && s[i].sub3<=69)
        {
                sub3gpa[i]=2;
                printf("%d",sub3gpa[i]);
        }

        else if ( s[i].sub3 >= 50 && s[i].sub3 <=59)
        {
                sub3gpa[i]=1;
                printf("%d",sub3gpa[i]);
        }

        else if ( s[i].sub3 >= 0 && s[i].sub3 <=49)
        {
                sub3gpa[i]=0;
                printf("%d",sub3gpa[i]);
        }

        printf("\n");
        cgpa=(sub1gpa[0]+sub2gpa[0]+sub3gpa[0])/3;
        printf("cgpa %d",cgpa);
        printf("\n");











}



return 0;

}
